articles.description: Ronaldo played in the Saudi Pro League for the first time on Sunday as his new side took on Al-Ettifaq, but struggled to impact the game despite his team winning 1-0 to remain top of the league.
articles.content: Al-Nassr manager Rudi Garcia has insisted his side don't need to change their way of playing to get the best out of Cristiano Ronaldo after the forward failed to make an impact on his first start for… [+2286 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Anthony Joshua agrees to fight Jermaine Franklin at the O2 Arena on April 1 - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY CHARLOTTE DALY: Sportsmail can reveal that Anthony Joshua has agreed to face American heavyweight Jermaine Franklin when he returns to action in April this year.
articles.content:
Anthony Joshua has agreed a deal to face American heavyweight Jermaine Franklin at the O2 Arena on April 1, Sportsmail can exclusively reveal.
